metadata.title: grafana: Spoofing of the originalUrl parameter of snapshots (moderate)
metadata.description:
DOCUMENTATION: A flaw was found in the grafana package. While creating a snapshot, an attacker may manipulate a hidden HTTP parameter to inject a malicious URL in the "Open original dashboard" button. 
            STATEMENT: OpenShift Service Mesh containers include the Grafana RPM from RHEL and consume CVE fixes for Grafana from RHEL channels. The servicemesh-grafana RPM shipped in early versions of OpenShift Service Mesh 2.1 is no longer maintained.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8 is installed
servicemesh-grafana is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
